00029 class TemplateCompilerEx {
00033  public $settings = null;
00034  
00035  // Plugins part
00039  public $plugins       = null;
00043  public $loadedPlugins = array();

00045  // Parser part
00050  private $parserCurrentToken = null;
00054  private $parserCurrentLine  = 1;
00058  private $parserCurrentFile  = null;
00062  private $parserTokenRegexp  = '~(\{\%.*?\%\})|(\{\{.*?\}\})|(\{\#.*?\#\})~u';

00064  // CodeGen part

00072  public $metadata       = array();

00078  // public API
00082  public function __construct() {
00083   // create plugins registry, and register built-ins
00084   $this->plugins = new TemplatePlugins(array(
00085    'tags' => array(
00086     'load'    => array(
00087      'plugin' => null, 'type' => 'inline', 'handler' => array($this, 'handleLoadBuiltin'), 'minArgs' => 1
00088     ),
00089     'comment' => array(
00090      'plugin' => null, 'type' => 'ignore', 'handler' => array($this, 'handleCommentBuiltin'), 'minArgs' => 0
00091     ),
00092    ),
00093    'filters' => array(),
00094    'hooks'   => array(),
00095   ));
00096  }

00102  public function reset() {
00103   $this->plugins->searchPaths = &$this->settings['pluginsPaths'];
00104   $this->blocks = $this->metadata = $this->loadedPlugins = array();
00105   $this->className = $this->parserCurrentToken = $this->parserCurrentFile = null;
00106   $this->parserCurrentLine = 1;
00107   
00108   $this->plugins->loadMultiple($this, null, $this->settings['loadPlugins']);
00109  }
00110  
00117  public function compile(ITemplateIODriver $io, $template) {
00118   $this->reset();
00119   
00120   if (($tpl = $io->loadTemplate($this->settings, $template)) === false) {
00121    throw new TemplateError('Could not load template "'.$in.'"', TemplateError::E_IO_LOAD_FAILURE);
00122   }
00123   
00124   $this->className          = $io->className($this->settings, $template);
00125   $this->parserCurrentFile  = $template;
00126   $this->metadata['usedIO'] = $io->driverID;
00127   
00128   $genAST  = $this->createAST($tpl);
00129   $genCode = $this->generateCode($genAST);
00130   
00131   // determine template's parent class
00132   $classCode = '<?php class '.$this->className.' extends ';
00133   if (isset($this->metadata['parentTemplate'])) {
00134    list($parentIO,$parent)  = TemplateUtils::parseIODSN($this->settings, $this->metadata['parentTemplate']);
00135    $classCode              .= $parentIO->className($this->settings, $parent);
00136    // main content is ignored, when template extends another
00137    unset($genCode['main']);
00138   } else {
00139    $classCode .= 'Template';
00140   }
00141   
00142   $classCode .= '{';
00143   foreach ($genCode as $blockName => &$blockCode) {
00144    $classCode .= 'function _'.TemplateUtils::sanitize($blockName).'($e){';
00145    // TODO: is constructor support really needed?
00146    if ($blockName == '_constructor') $classCode .= 'parent::__constructor();';
00147    $classCode .= $blockCode.'}';
00148   }
00149   $classCode .= '}';
00150   
00151   if ($io->saveMetadata($this->settings, $template, $this->metadata) === false) {
00152    throw new TemplateError(
00153     'Could not save template metadata (compiled from "'.$template.'")',
00154     TemplateError::E_IO_SAVE_FAILURE
00155    );
00156   }
00157   
00158   if ($io->saveTemplate($this->settings, $template, $classCode) === false) {
00159    throw new TemplateError(
00160     'Could not save template code (compiled from "'.$template.'").',
00161     TemplateError::E_IO_SAVE_FAILURE
00162    );
00163   }
00164  }
00165  
00166  // Parser part
00174  private function createAST(&$tpl) {
00175   $root = new TemplateNodeEx('root', null, null, $this->parserCurrentFile, -1);
00176   
00177   $tokens = preg_split($this->parserTokenRegexp, $tpl, -1, PREG_SPLIT_DELIM_CAPTURE | PREG_SPLIT_NO_EMPTY);
00178   $this->parseTokenStream($root, $tokens);
00179   
00180   return $root;
00181  }
00182  
00191  private function parserGetNextToken(array &$tokens) {
00192   $this->parserCurrentToken = array_shift($tokens);
00193   
00194   if ($this->parserCurrentToken === null) {
00195    return false;
00196   } elseif (mb_substr($this->parserCurrentToken, 0, 2) == '{%') {
00197    $this->parserCurrentToken = array(
00198     'type'    => 'tag',
00199     'content' => TemplateUtils::splitEscaped(
00200      ' ', trim(mb_substr($this->parserCurrentToken, 2, -2))
00201     )
00202    );
00203   } elseif (mb_substr($this->parserCurrentToken, 0, 2) == '{{') {
00204    $this->parserCurrentToken = array(
00205     'type'    => 'var',
00206     'content' => TemplateUtils::split(
00207      '|', trim(mb_substr($this->parserCurrentToken, 2, -2))
00208     ),
00209    );
00210   } elseif (mb_substr($this->parserCurrentToken, 0, 2) == '{#') {
00211    $this->parserCurrentToken = array(
00212     'type'    => 'comment',
00213     'content' => null,
00214    );
00215   } else {
00216    $this->parserCurrentToken = array(
00217     'type'    => 'text',
00218     'content' => $this->parserCurrentToken,
00219    );
00220   }
00221   
00222   return true;
00223  }
00224  
00235  private function parserEncounteredEndTag(TemplateNodeEx $node, $tag, $type) {
00236   if ($tag === null || $this->parserCurrentToken['type'] != 'tag') return false;
00237   
00238   $gotTag = &$this->parserCurrentToken['content'][0];
00239   $tag    = 'end'.$tag;
00240   
00241   if (mb_substr($gotTag, 0, 3) != 'end') {
00242    return false;
00243   } elseif ($gotTag != $tag && $type == 'block') {
00244    $this->raise(
00245     $node,
00246     'Invalid ending tag encountered - expected "'.$tag.'", got "'.$gotTag.'"',
00247     TemplateError::E_INVALID_SYNTAX
00248    );
00249   } elseif ($gotTag == $tag) {
00250    return true;
00251   }
00252   return true;
00253  }
00254  
00261  private function createNodeFromToken(TemplateNodeEx $node) {
00262   $token = &$this->parserCurrentToken;
00263   $node->addChild($token['type'], $token['content'], $this->parserCurrentFile, $this->parserCurrentLine);
00264  }
00265  
00274  private function parseTokenStream(TemplateNodeEx $node, array &$tokens, $parseUntil = null, $blockTagType = null) {
00275   while ($this->parserGetNextToken($tokens) && !$this->parserEncounteredEndTag($node, $parseUntil, $blockTagType)) {
00276    switch ($this->parserCurrentToken['type']) {
00277     case 'tag':
00278      $tag  = array_shift($this->parserCurrentToken['content']);
00279      $args = &$this->parserCurrentToken['content'];
00280      
00281      if (!$this->plugins->known('tag', $tag)) {
00282       // if doesn't exist, assume inline
00283       $tagInfo = array('type' => 'inline');
00284      } else {
00285       $tagInfo = $this->plugins->get('tag', $tag);
00286      }
00287      
00288      $newNode = new TemplateNodeEx('inlineTag', $node, array($tag, $args), $this->parserCurrentFile, $this->parserCurrentLine);
00289      if (in_array($tagInfo['type'], array('block', 'ignore'))) {
00290       $newNode->nodeID = 'blockTag';
00291       // capture block content
00292       $this->parseTokenStream($newNode, $tokens, $tag, ($blockTagType == 'ignore' ? 'ignore' : $tagInfo['type']));
00293      }
00294      
00295      $node->nodeChildren[] = $newNode;
00296     break;
00297     case 'var':
00298     case 'text':
00299      $this->createNodeFromToken($node);
00300      if ($this->parserCurrentToken['type'] == 'text') {
00301       // update current line counter
00302       $this->parserCurrentLine += mb_substr_count($this->parserCurrentToken['content'], "\n");
00303      }
00304     break;
00305    }
00306   }
00307  }

00309  // CodeGen part
00317  private function generateCode(TemplateNodeEx $root) {
00318   $this->createBlock('main', $root);
00319   return $this->blocks;
00320  }
00321  
00330  public function handleChildren(array &$children) {
00331   $code = '';
00332   foreach ($children as $child) {
00333    $code .= $this->handleNode($child);
00334   }
00335   return $code;
00336  }
00337  
00345  public function createBlock($block, TemplateNodeEx $node) {
00346   $this->blocks[$block] = '$b=\'\';'.$this->handleChildren($node->nodeChildren).'return $b;';
00347  }
00348  
00356  public function handleNode(TemplateNodeEx $node) {
00357   switch ($node->nodeID) {
00358    case 'text'     : return '$b.=\''.TemplateUtils::escape($node->nodeContent).'\';';
00359    case 'var'      : return $this->handleVariable($node);
00360    case 'blockTag' :
00361    case 'inlineTag': return $this->handleTag($node);
00362   }
00363  }
00364  
00372  private function handleTag(TemplateNodeEx $node) {
00373   $tag  = &$node->nodeContent[0];
00374   $args = &$node->nodeContent[1];
00375   
00376   $tagInfo = $this->commonVerifyElement($node, 'tag', $tag, $args);
00377   
00378   if (isset($tagInfo['parent'])) {
00379    $pattern  = '~^'.str_replace('\\*', '.*?', preg_quote($tagInfo['parent'], '~')).'$~su';
00380    
00381    $this->raiseIf(
00382     (!($node->nodeParent instanceof TemplateNodeEx) || !preg_match($pattern, $node->nodeParent->nodeContent[0])),
00383     $node,
00384     'Invalid tag nesting - tag "'.$tag.'" requires "'.$tagInfo['parent'].'" tag as immediate parent, '.
00385     '"'.$node->nodeParent->nodeContent[0].'" found',
00386     TemplateError::E_INVALID_SYNTAX
00387    );
00388    
00389    unset($pattern);
00390   }
00391   
00392   return call_user_func_array($tagInfo['handler'], array($this, $node, &$tag, &$args));
00393  }
00394  
00401  private function handleVariable(TemplateNodeEx $node) {
00402   list($variable, $filters) = $node->nodeContent;
00403   $noCheck                  = false;
00404   
00405   if (mb_substr($variable, 0, 1) == '@') {
00406    $noCheck  = true;
00407    $variable = mb_substr($variable, 1);
00408   }
00409   
00410   list($variableCode, $variableCheck) = $this->parseVariableExpression($node, $variable);
00411   $variableCode                       = $this->parseFilterChain($node, $filters, '@'.$variableCode);
00412   
00413   return ($noCheck ? '' : $variableCheck).'$b.='.$variableCode.';';
00414  }
00415  
00423  public function parseVariableExpression(TemplateNodeEx $node, $variable) {
00424   $ast   = $this->generateVariableAST($variable);
00425   $code  = $this->generateVariableCode($node, $ast);
00426   $check = 'if(!isset('.$code.')&&!is_null(@'.$code.')){$this->warnVar(\''.TemplateUtils::escape($variable).'\');}';
00427   
00428   // Hook-point: parseVariableExpression:postCodeGen
00429   $this->runHooks('parseVariableExpression:postCodeGen', array($node, &$code, &$check));
00430   //
00431   
00432   return array($code, $check);
00433  }
00434  
00442  private function generateVariableAST($variable) {
00443   $chunks = preg_split(
00444    '/(\[.*?\]|\.|\-\>)/s', $variable, -1,
00445    PREG_SPLIT_DELIM_CAPTURE | PREG_SPLIT_NO_EMPTY
00446   );
00447   
00448   foreach ($chunks as &$chunk) {
00449    if (mb_substr($chunk, 0, 1) == '[') {
00450     $chunk = $this->generateVariableAST(mb_substr($chunk, 1, -1));
00451    }
00452   }
00453   
00454   return array_filter($chunks, array('TemplateUtils', 'filterEmpty'));
00455  }
00456  
00464  private function generateVariableCode(TemplateNodeEx $node, &$ast) {
00465   $code      = '$this->ctx';
00466   $nextChunk = 'array'; // array, object or operator
00467   $operators = array('.' => 'array', '->' => 'object');
00468   
00469   while (($currentChunk = array_shift($ast)) !== null) {
00470    if ($nextChunk == 'operator') {
00471     $this->raiseIf(
00472      (!isset($operators[$currentChunk])),
00473      $node,
00474      'Variable access operator expected ("." or "->"), but "'.$currentChunk.'" found',
00475      TemplateError::E_INVALID_SYNTAX
00476     );
00477     
00478     $nextChunk = $operators[$currentChunk];
00479    } else {
00480     switch ($nextChunk) {
00481      case 'array':
00482       $chunkTemplate         = '[%s]';
00483       $chunkVariableTemplate = '@%s';
00484       $chunkNumberTemplate   = '%d';
00485       $chunkStringTemplate   = '\'%s\'';
00486      break;
00487      case 'object':
00488       $chunkTemplate         = '->%s';
00489       $chunkVariableTemplate = '{@%s}';
00490       $chunkNumberTemplate   = '{%d}';
00491       $chunkStringTemplate   = null;
00492      break;
00493      default:
00494       TemplateUtils::panic(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00495      break;
00496     }
00497     
00498     if (is_array($currentChunk)) {
00499      // variable index
00500      $chunkCode = sprintf($chunkVariableTemplate, $this->generateVariableCode($node, $currentChunk));
00501     } elseif (ctype_digit($currentChunk)) {
00502      // integer index
00503      $chunkCode = sprintf($chunkNumberTemplate, $currentChunk);
00504     } else {
00505      if ($chunkStringTemplate) {
00506       $currentChunk = sprintf($chunkStringTemplate, TemplateUtils::escape($currentChunk));
00507      }
00508      $chunkCode = $currentChunk;
00509     }
00510     
00511     $code .= sprintf($chunkTemplate, $chunkCode);
00512     
00513     $nextChunk = 'operator';
00514    }
00515   }
00516   
00517   return $code;
00518  }
00519  
00528  public function parseFilterChain(TemplateNodeEx $node, $filterExpr, $code) {
00529   $filterChain = TemplateUtils::splitEscaped('|', $filterExpr);
00530   $resultCode  = $code;
00531   
00532   // Hook-point: parseFilterChain:entry
00533   $this->runHooks('parseFilterChain:entry', array(&$filterChain));
00534   //
00535   
00536   foreach ($filterChain as &$filter) {
00537    list($name, $args) = TemplateUtils::split(':', $filter);
00538    if ($args) {
00539     $args = TemplateUtils::splitEscaped(',', $args);
00540    } else {
00541     $args = array();
00542    }
00543    
00544    foreach ($args as &$arg) {
00545     if (mb_substr($arg, 0, 1) == '"') {
00546      $arg = array('string', '\''.TemplateUtils::escape(mb_substr($arg, 1, -1)).'\'');
00547     } elseif (preg_match('~^\-?[0-9]+(?:\.[0-9]+)?$~', $arg)) {
00548      $arg = array('number', $arg);
00549     } else {
00550      list($code,) = $this->parseVariableExpression($node, $arg);
00551      $arg = array('variable', '@'.$code);
00552     }
00553    }
00554    
00555    $filterInfo = $this->commonVerifyElement($node, 'filter', $name, $args);
00556    $filterCode = call_user_func_array(
00557     $filterInfo['handler'], array($this, $node, &$name, &$args)
00558    );
00559    
00560    $resultCode = sprintf($filterCode, $resultCode);
00561   }
00562   
00563   return $resultCode;
00564  }
00565  
00580  private function commonVerifyElement(TemplateNodeEx $node, $element, &$name, array &$args) {
00581   if (!in_array($element, array('tag', 'filter'))) {
00582    TemplateUtils::panic(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00583   }
00584   
00585   $this->raiseIf(
00586    (!$this->plugins->known($element, $name)),
00587    $node,
00588    'Unknown '.$element.' "'.$name.'" encountered',
00589    ($element == 'tag' ? TemplateError::E_UNKNOWN_TAG : TemplateError::E_UNKNOWN_FILTER)
00590   );
00591   
00592   $elementInfo = $this->plugins->get($element, $name);
00593   
00594   TemplateUtils::checkIfAllowed($this, $element, $name, $node);
00595   
00596   if (!is_callable($elementInfo['handler'])) {
00597    throw new TemplateError(
00598     'Invalid handler ['.TemplateUtils::strip(var_export($elementInfo['handler'], true)).
00599     '] supplied for '.$element.' "'.$name.'" by plugin "'.$elementInfo['plugin'].'"',
00600     TemplateError::E_INVALID_HANDLER
00601    );
00602   }
00603   
00604   if (isset($elementInfo['minArgs'])) {
00605    $this->raiseIf(
00606     (count($args) < $elementInfo['minArgs']),
00607     $node,
00608     'Invalid '.$element.' call - '.$element.' "'.$name.'" requires at least '.
00609     '"'.$elementInfo['minArgs'].'" arguments ',
00610     TemplateError::E_INVALID_SYNTAX
00611    );
00612   }
00613   
00614   return $elementInfo;
00615  }

00618  
00628  private function handleLoadBuiltin(TemplateCompilerEx $compiler, TemplateNodeEx $node, &$tag, array &$args) {
00629   $this->raiseIf(
00630    ($this->plugins->load($this, $node, $args[0], null, true) === false),
00631    $node,
00632    'Tried to load non-existant or invalid plugin "'.$args[0].'"',
00633    TemplateError::E_UNKNOWN_PLUGIN
00634   );
00635   
00636   // {% load %} generates no code
00637   return '';
00638  }

00649  private function handleCommentBuiltin(TemplateCompilerEx $compiler, TemplateNodeEx $node, &$tag, array &$args) {
00650   // no block-level code generated
00651   return '';
00652  }

00655  
00665  public function raise(TemplateNodeEx $node, $message, $code) {
00666   throw new TemplateError(
00667    $message.' (in template "'.$node->nodeFile.'" somewhere around line '.$node->nodeLine.')',
00668    $code
00669   );
00670  }
00671  
00682  public function raiseIf($cond, TemplateNodeEx $node, $message, $code) {
00683   if ($cond === true) $this->raise($node, $message, $code);
00684  }
00685  
00695  public function findAlternativeBranch(TemplateNodeEx $node, $tag) {
00696   $alternativeIdx = null;
00697 
00698   foreach ($node->nodeChildren as $idx => $childNode) {
00699    if ($childNode->nodeID == 'inlineTag' && $childNode->nodeContent[0] == $tag) {
00700     $alternativeIdx = $idx;
00701     break;
00702    }
00703   }
00704 
00705   if ($alternativeIdx) {
00706    $mainNodes        = array_slice($node->nodeChildren, 0, $alternativeIdx);
00707    $alternativeNodes = array_slice($node->nodeChildren, $alternativeIdx + 1);
00708   } else {
00709    $mainNodes        = &$node->nodeChildren;
00710    $alternativeNodes = array();
00711   }
00712 
00713   return array($mainNodes, $alternativeNodes);
00714  }
00715  
00729  public function generateUniqueBlock($idPrefix, $blockPrefix = 'custom:', $keyLength = 5) {
00730   if (32 - $keyLength <= 0) {
00731    TemplateUtils::panic(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00732   }
00733   
00734   do {
00735    $generatedID  = md5(uniqid($idPrefix, true));
00736    $randomOffset = mt_rand(0, 32 - $keyLength);
00737 
00738    $blockName = $blockPrefix.mb_substr($generatedID, $randomOffset, $keyLength);
00739   } while (isset($this->blocks[$blockName]));
00740 
00741   return $blockName;
00742  }
00743  
00744  // Hooks
00745  
00756  private function runHooks($hookPoint, array $args) {
00757   array_unshift($args, $this);
00758   $handlers = $this->plugins->get('hook', $hookPoint);
00759   
00760   foreach ($handlers as &$hookInfo) {
00761    $handler = &$hookInfo['handler'];
00762    
00763    if (!is_callable($handler)) {
00764     throw new TemplateError(
00765      'Invalid handler ['.TemplateUtils::strip(var_export($hookInfo['handler'], true)).
00766      '] hooked into "'.$hookPoint.'" point by plugin "'.$hookInfo['plugin'].'"',
00767      TemplateError::E_INVALID_HANDLER
00768     );
00769    }
00770    
00771    if (call_user_func_array($handler, $args) === true) return true;
00772   }
00773   
00774   return false;
00775  }
00776 }

00784 class TemplateNodeEx {
00790  public $nodeID       = '';
00794  public $nodeParent   = null;
00798  public $nodeChildren = array();
00803  public $nodeContent  = null;
00807  public $nodeLine     = 0;
00811  public $nodeFile     = null;
00812  
00822  public function __construct($id, $parent = null, $content = null, $file = null, $line = 0) {
00823   $this->nodeID      = $id;
00824   $this->nodeParent  = $parent;
00825   $this->nodeContent = $content;
00826   $this->nodeLine    = $line;
00827   $this->nodeFile    = $file;
00828  }
00829 
00838  public function addChild($id, $content = null, $file = null, $line = 0) {
00839   $this->nodeChildren[] = new TemplateNodeEx($id, $this, $content, $file, $line);
00840  }
00841  
00848  public function dump($level = 0) {
00849   $out = '';
00850   for ($i = 0; $i < $level; ++$i) { $out .= ' '; }
00851   $out .= 'ast<'.$this->nodeID.'>';
00852   if (is_array($this->nodeContent)) {
00853    $out .= '('.$this->nodeContent[0];
00854    if (count($this->nodeContent[1]) > 0) {
00855     $out .= ', '.implode(', ', $this->nodeContent[1]);
00856    }
00857    $out .= ')';
00858   } else {
00859    $s = str_replace("\n", '\n', $this->nodeContent);
00860    if (mb_strlen($s) > 30) $s = mb_substr($s, 0, 30).'[...]';
00861    $out .= '("'.$s.'")';
00862   }
00863   $out .= ' @ '.$this->nodeFile.':'.$this->nodeLine." => [\n";
00864   foreach ($this->nodeChildren as $child) { $out .= $child->dump($level + 1); }
00865   for ($i = 0; $i < $level; ++$i) { $out .= ' '; }
00866   return $out . "]\n";
00867  }
00868 }
